answers.answer: Hi Antonio,How are you feeling?I think if you have got Candida in stool positive this suggests that you might be having Candida infection any where in GIT.I think that could be the cause of your persistent pin prickly sensation.I also feel you should be evaluated for Diabetes as this can cause pin prickly sensation apart from sensory deficits.Keep me informed if you have any queries.Bye.

question: I have been experiencing itchy, pin pricky skin for the last 3 years.  I have followed every possible route: allergists, dermatologists, etc.   recently my Dr found candida (yeast) in my stool sample. I am having an endoscopy and colonoscopy soon.  Please let me know if there's any hope out thereThanks
title: Pin Pricky skin
